Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Jim C.
Reviews.Content: It's what I expect out of a hp. Nice to still be able too get win7 and not win8. If you need a easy computer get it. If you need all the bells and whistles don't bother. This is more then I need and I'm glad I got it.

Reviews.Title: Hp Laptop
Reviews.Author: Michelle Brown
Reviews.Content: I have really enjoy it. the size if just right for carrying in my bag that has my work logo on it. There is nothing negative I can say about it, but everything all good

Reviews.Title: Good Win 7 Laptop
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a replacement for my HP Mini (Win XP).  It is slightly larger than I wanted, but the price and performance are reasonable and it fits nicely in my small leather carry on briefcase.

Reviews.Title: Okay, but..
Reviews.Author: Sondra
Reviews.Content: I like the computer but, since I'm a novice, I would have liked some instructions on the major keys. I have to wait until someone shows up that is familiar with them

Reviews.Title: My opinion
Reviews.Author: Tommie Jean Williams
Reviews.Content: There are things that I really like about my new laptop, but some disappointments also.  I cannot find an on/off for the touch pad that I am not using.  I accidently touch it and the cursor goes flying everywhere.  How can I disable it?Also, the font size keeps switching size all the time!  It will be big and then get small, I put it where I want it and it changes again.  I am not touching anything, it just changes, very frequently.  Very time consuming, chasing the cursor and putting the size back.I like the speed of it.

Reviews.Title: Got this from HP as a replacement for a failed ...
Reviews.Author: J. Kainen
Reviews.Content: Got this from HP as a replacement for a failed laptop under warranty. No wonder they are giving them away. No battery life and slow, slow, slow!
